thread.title: BRIEF-K12 Inc Q3 Revenues $232.9 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-K12 Inc Q3 Revenues $232.9 Million
text:
K12 Inc:
* K12 Inc REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 WITH REVENUES OF $232.9 MILLION
* Q3 REVENUE $232.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $227.3 MILLION
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32 * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.34 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE IN THE RANGE OF $906 MILLION TO $912 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN THE RANGE OF $43 MILLION TO $47 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED OPERATING INCOME OF $46 MILLION TO $50 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
